title: Phase 3: Migrate to cosalette Store persistence
description: Replace StateStoragePort with cosalette.Store. Replace JsonFileStorage with cosalette.JsonFileStore. Replace NullStorage with cosalette.NullStore, FakeStorage with cosalette.MemoryStore. Wire store= on App constructor. Refactor gas_counter to use DeviceStore + persist= policy. Delete custom storage code (adapters/json_storage.py, storage classes in adapters/fake.py). Remove _make_storage_adapter() factory. Update all tests. Closes gate task workspace-5wl.

title: Phase 2: Direct registration + enabled= parameter
description: Replace @app.device('gas_counter') wrapper with app.add_device('gas_counter', gas_counter). Replace if settings.enable_debug_device block with enabled= on @app.telemetry. Remove create_app() function â€” move to module-level declarations. Update integration tests.

title: Phase 1: Adapter lifecycle + settings DI
description: Add __aenter__/__aexit__ to Qmc5883lAdapter and FakeMagnetometer. Change Qmc5883lAdapter.__init__ to accept Gas2MqttSettings via DI. Remove lifespan() hook and _make_magnetometer() factory from main.py. Update MagnetometerPort protocol if needed. Update tests.

title: Adopt cosalette 0.1.5: declarative main.py
description: Upgrade gas2mqtt to leverage cosalette 0.1.5 features: adapter lifecycle protocol, settings-aware DI, direct function registration, enabled= parameter, declarative adapters= dict, and cosalette Store persistence. Reduces main.py from ~128 lines to ~40 declarative lines. Closes gate tasks workspace-5wl and workspace-jrq.

title: Adopt cosalette 0.1.4: PT1 filter, init=, eager settings
description: Upgrade cosalette to 0.1.4. Replace custom EWMA with PT1 filter via init= callback. Use eager settings to eliminate model_fields hack. Inline temperature/magnetometer handlers. Remove dead code (ewma.py, handler factories). Rename ewma_alpha to smoothing_tau.

title: Device integration + Tests
description: Modify gas_counter() to load state on startup, save after each publish, save on shutdown. Update tests for restore, save, corruption recovery, NullStorage no-op.

title: Settings + App Wiring
description: Add state_file: Path | None setting to Gas2MqttSettings. Register StateStoragePort adapter in create_app() with factory. Update integration tests for adapter resolution.

title: Port + Adapters + Tests
description: Define StateStoragePort in ports.py. Implement JsonFileStorage (atomic write via replace), NullStorage, FakeStorage adapters. Unit tests for all three including corruption handling and missing file.

title: State persistence for gas counter
description: Add state persistence so cumulative gas consumption and tick counter survive app restarts. Implements a StateStoragePort (app-level) with JsonFileStorage, NullStorage, and FakeStorage adapters.

title: Fix release-please repo permission
description: Enable 'Allow GitHub Actions to create and approve pull requests' in repo settings. Re-run failed workflow. No code changes needed.

title: API reference pages
description: Create API reference section with mkdocstrings. Public-facing modules first (settings, ports, domain), then full internal reference (devices, adapters, main).

title: Doc pages: index, getting-started, config, mqtt, architecture
description: Create core user-facing doc pages and update zensical.toml nav. Slim README to billboard with link to docs site.

title: User documentation site
description: Create zensical-based user documentation: index, getting-started, configuration, mqtt-topics, architecture, API reference. Update nav. Slim README to billboard.

title: Phase 6: App wiring + main.py + integration tests
description: Wire everything in main.py: App creation, adapter registration, device registration, lifespan handler for I2C init/cleanup. Integration tests with AppHarness. Verify dry-run mode.

title: Phase 5: Debug magnetometer device
description: Implement conditional @app.telemetry('magnetometer') that only registers when settings.enable_debug_device is True. Returns raw bx/by/bz. Unit tests.
close_reason: Phase 5 complete: debug magnetometer device + 4 tests

title: Phase 4: Temperature device
description: Implement @app.telemetry('temperature') with EWMA filter. Reads from MagnetometerPort.read_temperature(). Unit tests.
close_reason: Phase 4+5 complete: temperature + magnetometer devices + 10 tests

title: Phase 3: Gas counter device
description: Implement @app.device('gas_counter') with 1Hz polling loop, Schmitt trigger, counter, optional consumption tracking, @ctx.on_command for consumption set. Unit tests with MockMqtt+FakeClock+FakeMagnetometer.

title: Phase 2: Domain logic (pure, no I/O)
description: Implement SchmittTrigger (state machine), EwmaFilter, ConsumptionTracker classes. All pure domain with comprehensive unit tests (BVA, state transitions).
close_reason: Phase 2 complete: SchmittTrigger, EwmaFilter, ConsumptionTracker + 36 tests

title: Phase 1: Project setup + settings + adapter ports
description: Add cosalette/smbus2 deps. Replace scaffolded config.py with Gas2MqttSettings (cosalette Settings subclass). Define MagnetometerPort protocol, MagneticReading dataclass, Hmc5883lAdapter (production), FakeMagnetometer (dry-run). Update test fixtures. Write unit tests. Create .env.example.
close_reason: Phase 1 complete: settings, ports, adapters, 34 tests

title: Epic: gas2mqtt migration to cosalette
description: Migrate legacy hmc5883.py gas meter monitoring app to the cosalette IoT framework. Covers settings, adapters, domain logic, devices, integration, and deployment.
close_reason: Epic complete: gas2mqtt migrated to cosalette (7 phases, 101 tests)

title: Phase 4: Declarative adapters + docs cleanup
description: Move adapter registration into adapters= dict on App constructor. Update framework-opportunities.md, main-declarativeness-improvements.md, ADR, and reference docs to reflect 0.1.5 adoption. Close beads gate tasks workspace-5wl and workspace-jrq.

title: Migrate temperature + magnetometer to @app.telemetry with publish strategies
description: Convert temperature device from @app.device with manual poll loop to @app.telemetry with OnChange(threshold={"temperature": 0.05}). Convert magnetometer to @app.telemetry with conditional registration. Update adapter factories to use settings injection (0.1.1). Update all tests.

title: Upgrade cosalette to 0.1.2 + adopt publish strategies
Phase 7: Documentation + deployment
description: Create Dockerfile + docker-compose.yml. Write framework-opportunities.md. Create migration ADR. Update README. Finalize .env.example.
close_reason: Phase 7 complete: README, ADR, Dockerfile, docker-compose

title: Propose cosalette public device introspection API
description: Tests currently access app._telemetry (private) to verify device registration. Propose a public introspection method like app.registered_devices() to the cosalette project so tests can verify registration without coupling to internal structure. See PR #6 review for context.

title: Update documentation for telemetry migration
description: Update reference docs, device docstrings, and any relevant architecture docs to reflect the @app.telemetry migration.

title: Evaluate extracting StoragePort to cosalette
description: Gate task: When building the next cosalette-based project, evaluate extracting StateStoragePort + JsonFileStorage + NullStorage + FakeStorage into the cosalette framework. See discussion in PR for full options analysis.

title: Re-evaluate framework opportunities
description: Revisit framework-opportunities.md: HA Auto-Discovery, Calibration Commands, Structured Logging, Event-Driven Telemetry, Multi-Sensor, Prometheus. Assess feasibility and create implementation tasks as needed.
